Package models

Class CacheManager

java.lang.Object
models.CacheManager
@Singleton
public class CacheManager
extends java.lang.Object
This class is a Singleton class which handles caching of already searched terms
Author:
Saghana Mahesh Sarma, Sumit Ramesh Bhiungade, Jai Sahni

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static CacheManager GetCache​(play.libs.ws.WSClient ws, java.lang.String endpoint)
    This will be used to get the cache object
    java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<QuerySearchResult> GetThreadInfo​(java.lang.String keyTerm)
    This method checks if the subreddit is present in the Hash Data structure already else calls the below method - AddThreadToCache to retrieve the information and returns the result
    java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<QuerySearchResult> GetTrimmedSearchResult​(java.lang.String keyTerm)
    This method will return the Trimmed result set for given search term i.e only top 10 results which need to be shown to user.
    java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<QuerySearchResult> GetUserInfo​(java.lang.String keyTerm)
    This method checks if the user Id is present in the Hash Data structure already else calls the below method - AddOwnerInfoToCache to retrieve the information and returns the result

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • GetCache

      public static CacheManager GetCache​(play.libs.ws.WSClient ws, java.lang.String endpoint)
      This will be used to get the cache object
      Returns:
      The singleton cache object CacheManager

    • GetTrimmedSearchResult

      public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<QuerySearchResult> GetTrimmedSearchResult​(java.lang.String keyTerm)
      This method will return the Trimmed result set for given search term i.e only top 10 results which need to be shown to user. This will first fetch and store the data if it is not already present
      Parameters:
      keyTerm - - The search term for which you want to fetch the result
      Returns:
      The result of type QuerySearchResult which will contain only 10 results for that search term

    • GetThreadInfo

      public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<QuerySearchResult> GetThreadInfo​(java.lang.String keyTerm)
      This method checks if the subreddit is present in the Hash Data structure already else calls the below method - AddThreadToCache to retrieve the information and returns the result
      Parameters:
      keyTerm - - This is the search term for which we check if it already exists in the HashMap
      Returns:
      QuerySearchResult object for corresponding subreddit

    • GetUserInfo

      public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<QuerySearchResult> GetUserInfo​(java.lang.String keyTerm)
      This method checks if the user Id is present in the Hash Data structure already else calls the below method - AddOwnerInfoToCache to retrieve the information and returns the result
      Parameters:
      keyTerm - - This is the search term for which we check if it already exists in the HashMap
      Returns:
      QuerySearchResult object for corresponding user
